vocabInfos.mediumDef:
A man of the tribe of Manasseh living at the time of Egypt and Wilderness, first mentioned at Num.26.32;
son of: Gilead (H1568H);
brother of: Abiezer (H0044I), Helek (H2507), Asriel (H0844), Shechem (H7928) and Shemida (H8061);
father of: Zelophehad (H6765)
Group of che.pher (חֵ֫פֶר "Hepher" H2660A)
§ Hepherites = see Hepher "a pit" or "shame"
descendants of Hepher, son of Gilead
vocabInfos._es_Definition: descendiente de Héfer; tribu de Manasés
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
希弗族 这个陽性名詞在希伯來文的意思是 見 希弗 "坑" 或 "羞恥"
基列的兒子希弗的後裔(民 26:32)
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
希弗族 这个阳性名词在希伯来文的意思是 见 希弗 "坑" 或 "羞耻"
基列的儿子希弗的后裔(民 26:32)
